name: @jjdenhertog/spotify-to-plex-tidal-downloader
description: Tiddl implementation for Spotify to Plex

scripts.docker:dev: npm run docker:build && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker:push: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t jjdenhertog/spotify-to-plex-tidal-downloader:latest -t jjdenhertog/spotify-to-plex-tidal-downloader:$PACKAGE_VERSION --push .
scripts.deploy: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run docker:push
